attributes.action: Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for the Skilled Worker visa holders and dependants
attributes.additional_details: Skilled visa holders move to the UK for better opportunities and in they contribute to the UK economy, pay taxes, and support critical sectors like, accounting, finance, health, care, and engineering. Changing ILR rules seems unfair and causing stress for families already in UK and planning to come. Keep the rules and timeframe to ILR same as already, we would appreciate if this can be seriously considered.
attributes.background: To keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for the Skilled Worker visa holders and dependants

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
